title: Update Google site verification meta tag content to 3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7

requirements.text: Replace the existing Google site verification meta tag content in frontend/index.html from the current value to '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'

quotes:
Update Google verification meta tag with this code:

3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7

acceptanceCriteria: The meta tag in frontend/index.html has name='google-site-verification'
The content attribute value is exactly '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'
The meta tag remains in the <head> section
No other meta tags are modified

constraints: Only modify the content attribute value of the google-site-verification meta tag
Do not change any other meta tags or HTML structure
nonGoals: Modifying SEO or Open Graph tags
